document_data.caption: A map showing Al-Malja river near Ajayib.
document_data.name: Al-Malja River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Malja River''' was found in the far southern corner of [[west Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: Al-Malja River flowed east down from [[Al-Suqut Mountains]] through the [[Pearl Cities]] region. It emptied into the [[Crowded Sea]] at [[Ajayib]], the City of Wonders.
document_data.Description: Though small in size, Al-Malja, and the fertile lands hugging its banks, were vital for the city of Ajayib.
